Text: Picobrouwerij Alvinne is a small brewery in the small hamlet of Moen near the Belgian city of Zwevegem.
Triplets:<Picobrouwerij Alvinne
1:
--------------------
Text: Picobrouwerij Alvinne:  The name of the brewery derives from a female spirit of local folk tales, who can be seen depicted on the brewery's logo and labels.

Triplets:<Picobrouwerij Alvinne
